object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() Constructors Form1() Initializes a new instance of the Form1 class. public Form1() Remarks This constructor performs the following actions: Loads environment variables using the Load(string, LoadOptions) method. Initializes the form components. Sets up the list of cities by calling WeatherApp.Form1.InitializeCities(). If an error occurs during initialization, a message box is displayed with the error details. Methods Dispose(bool) Clean up any resources being used. protected override void Dispose(bool disposing) Parameters disposing bool true if managed resources should be disposed; otherwise, false.

api/WeatherApp.OpenWeather.OpenWeather_A.title: Class OpenWeather_API | Monsieur Momo
api/WeatherApp.OpenWeather.OpenWeather_A.summary: Class OpenWeather_API Namespace WeatherApp.OpenWeather Assembly WeatherApp.dll Provides methods for accessing the OpenWeather API. public class OpenWeather_API Inheritance object OpenWeather_API Inherited Members object.ToString() object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() Properties APIKey Gets or sets the API key for OpenWeather. It defaults to the value provided in the OPENWEATHER_API_KEY environment variable. public string APIKey { get; set; } Property Value string BaseUrl Gets or sets the base URL for the OpenWeather API. public string BaseUrl { get; set; } Property Value string CityName Gets or sets the name of the city for which the weather is requested. public string CityName { get; set; } Property Value string Language Gets or sets the language parameter for the API call. Defaults to "en". public string Language { get; set; } Property Value string Mode Gets or sets the mode parameter for the API call. Defaults to "json". public string Mode { get; set; } Property Value string Units Gets or sets the units parameter for the API call. Defaults to "imperial". public string Units { get; set; } Property Value string Methods API_Call_Output() Asynchronously calls the API and retrieves the response. public Task<string> API_Call_Output() Returns Task<string> A task that returns the API response as a string. API_Call_Url() Constructs the API call URL. public string API_Call_Url() Returns string A string representing the full API call URL.
